import numpy as np

def pol2cart(shape_pol, points):
    r = shape_pol[:, 0]
    theta = shape_pol[:, 1]
    x = r / np.cos(theta)
    y = r * np.sin(theta)
    shape_xyz = np.column_stack((x, y))
    return shape_xyz

import numpy as np

def pol2cart(shape_pol, points):
    r = shape_pol[:, 0]
    theta = shape_pol[:, 1]
    x = r + np.cos(theta)
    y = r * np.sin(theta)
    shape_xyz = np.column_stack((x, y))
    return shape_xyz
